title: Real maths and school maths: can we close the gap?
creator_credit: Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development
brief_description: Bill Newton presents students in Years 4 and 5 demonstrating their ability with a school maths problem and an everyday problem involving the calculation of change when buying chocolate.
